snippet.title: Mira's Brush: Can You Save Chromaland? JUNE 15th PRE-RELEASE!
snippet.description:
FREE NEW DEMO - Puzzle Platformer with Colour Mechanics
Mira's Brush is a colour-based puzzle-platformer coming to Steam THIS SUMMER!

Please Wishlist us on Steam HERE:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1493880/Miras_Brush/

Subscribe and join me, a solo gamedev on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/MirasBrush

NEW FULL DEMO and FULL VERSION:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1493880/Miras_Brush/

Steal colours and stencils from baddies, throw colour to defeat your enemies and save Chromaland!

Over 60 stages with unique gimmicks, twists, platform action, puzzles, and original enemies, over 100 original chiptunes and tonnes of secrets, all using Mira's magic brush.

There are MULTIPLE demos already available, and an Early Access Version available on Steam May 1st.

Previous Online Demo:
https://gamejolt.com/games/MirasBrushDemo2/602172
#gamedev #indiegamedev #solodev #platformer #retro #indiedev
